name: Soldiers?
description:
Impersonate a cruel God and try to protect your faithful minions from the evil giants. How? By sacrificing them of course! Pick them from the ground and drop them into the dynamite to create powerful explosive minions or sacrifice them to unlock two new weapons. Make them eat the candies to give to your munitions a boost!

Beware: if you pick your minion in hand they are considered gone!

Controls:
Move mouse/scroll to move, wheel to zoom. Click to pick minions from the ground, release to drop them. Mouse and click to aim and shoot using the two weapons.
